description: Try our easy to follow Salted Caramel Popcorn & Almond Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Salted Caramel Popcorn & Almond Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 ml extra virgin olive oil spray
1.5 cup Cobram Estate Light Extra Virgin Olive Oil

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium-sized bowl, add remaining popcorn, almonds and 2-3 tbs salted caramel sauce and stir until combined and sticking together. Spoon mixture on top of cake and drizzle with remaining caramel sauce. Top with your preferred birthday cake toppers to serve.
